channel.title: [Development] New 2007 RSPS Project Phoenix
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VMHvPdM.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=3][B][U]What is Project Phoenix?[/U][/B][/SIZE] -Project Phoenix is Project Insanity Server -Project Phoenix is currently under development to release as Beta -Project Phoenix will be a unique Private Server that feeds your craving for nostalgia with an Old School feel while not having to grind as long. -Project Phoenix will be a x20 exp server with the capability of going lower. -Project Phoenix has been underdevelopment since August 3rd, 2013.
[SIZE=3][B][U]Features[/U][/B][/SIZE] -All Skills Working -Combat System is accurate -All Skillcapes with Emotes -100% Clan Chat -Slayer Tasks Working -Economy (Everything is not just given to you, or buy-able from a shop. Almost all skills can make you money)
[SIZE=3][B][U]Near Future[/U][/B][/SIZE] -Official Website -vBulletin Forums -Bugs and Glitches Fixed -All Doors Open/CENTER]
[SIZE=3][B][U]Long Term Future[/U][/B][/SIZE] -Warriors Guild -Fire Cape Mini Game - Custom Quests -Official Highscores -Voting Rewards System -Custom Quests
[SIZE=3][B][U]Founder and Owner[/U][/B][/SIZE] Braeden Co-Owner of Elysian07
[I][B]Developer Helpers Needed[/B] Yes, what half of the people are here for. Lol
If you know a lot about Java Programming especially [PI] I'd like you to talk with you if you're interested in programming for the server.
I'm currently doing this as a hobby right now which means it could be long time before BETA could even come out, so I could use the help. Please post below if you're interested and I'll give you some contact information so we can speak. :)
I don't need the help but would love it so I can release this soon to be awesome server out to all of you![/CENTER][/I]

You’ve custom quests down twice.

item.title: [Development] New 2007 RSPS Project Phoenix
item.dc:creator: @BraedenD BraedenD
item.description:
@BraedenD wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=3]What is Project Phoenix?[/SIZE]
-Project Phoenix is Project Insanity Server
-Project Phoenix is currently under development to release as Beta
-Project Phoenix will be a unique Private Server that feeds your craving for nostalgia with an Old School feel while not having to grind as long.
-Project Phoenix will be a x20 exp server with the capability of going lower.
-Project Phoenix has been underdevelopment since August 3rd, 2013.

[SIZE=3]Features[/SIZE]
-All Skills Working
-Combat System is accurate
-All Skillcapes with Emotes
-100% Clan Chat
-Slayer Tasks Working
-Economy (Everything is not just given to you, or buy-able from a shop. Almost all skills can make you money)

[SIZE=3]Near Future[/SIZE]
-Official Website
-vBulletin Forums
-Bugs and Glitches Fixed
-All Doors Open/CENTER]

[SIZE=3]Long Term Future[/SIZE]
-Warriors Guild
-Fire Cape Mini Game

  • Custom Quests
    -Official Highscores
    -Voting Rewards System
    -Custom Quests

[SIZE=3]Founder and Owner[/SIZE]
Braeden
Co-Owner of Elysian07

[I]Developer Helpers Needed
Yes, what half of the people are here for. Lol

If you know a lot about Java Programming especially [PI] I’d like you to talk with you if you’re interested in programming for the server.

I’m currently doing this as a hobby right now which means it could be long time before BETA could even come out, so I could use the help. Please post below if you’re interested and I’ll give you some contact information so we can speak.

I don’t need the help but would love it so I can release this soon to be awesome server out to all of you![/CENTER][/I]

Read full topic
